channel.title: R Markdown on Ron Brown
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Ron Brown

item.title: My New Site
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min.

item.title: Test2
item.description: We build a linear regression below. fit = lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) b = coef(summary(fit)) plot(fit) The slope of the regression is r b[2, 1].

item.title: Goodbye R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown 123 This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
